00243     template <typename T> 
00244     inline _xvec2<T> _xvec2<T>::operator* (const _xmat2<T>& m) const
00245     {
00246         return _xvec2<T>(
00247             m[0][0] * this->x + m[0][1] * this->y,
00248             m[1][0] * this->x + m[1][1] * this->y);
00249     }
00250 
00251     template <typename T> 
00252     inline _xvec2<T>& _xvec2<T>::operator*= (const _xmat2<T>& m)
00253     {
00254         return *this = *this * m;
00255     }

00415     // This function shouldn't required but it seems that VC7.1 have an optimisation bug if this operator wasn't declared
00416     inline _bvec2& _bvec2::operator=(const _bvec2& x)
00417     {

00419         this->y = x.y;
00420         return *this;

00423     inline _bvec2 _bvec2::operator--()
00424     {
00425             x = !x;
00426             y = !y;
00427             return *this;
00428     }
00429 
00430     inline _bvec2 _bvec2::operator++()
00431     {
00432             x = !x;
00433             y = !y;
00434             return *this;
00435     }

00438     {
00439         return _bvec2(
00440                         !this->x, 
00441                         !this->y);
